review:
I consulted with Dr Sheela for my second child and really, I would like to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care she provided throughout my pregnancy and during the delivery of my baby. Her professionalism, expertise, and compassionate approach truly made all the difference. From our very first appointment, I felt reassured and supported by her approach and guidance. She took the time to listen to my concerns and always answered my questions with patience and understanding. Her calm demeanour and reassuring presence helped alleviate any anxieties I had along the way.

During the delivery, complications arose but her encouragement and support gave me the strength I needed during those pivotal moments. I will always be grateful for her steady hand and unwavering dedication.

Even after the delivery, her care didn't stop. She continued to provide invaluable support during the postpartum period, offering guidance on newborn care and addressing any concerns that arose.

Thanks to her, I had a positive and empowering birth experience that I will cherish forever. I wholeheartedly recommend her services to anyone seeking exceptional care during pregnancy and childbirth.

Thank you, Dr Sheela, once again for everything.

I want to take a moment to express my deep gratitude and appreciation for Dr. Sheela. From the very first appointment, Dr. Sheela demonstrated exceptional professionalism, compassion, and expertise.Dr. Sheela truly listens to concerns and takes the time to explain every detail, ensuring that I fully understand my treatment options and feel comfortable with the care plan. Her dedication to patient care is evident during and after the treatment.

We consulted Dr. Sheela Mam when we were in utmost need of a cooperative Doctor...I was having a complication in my 3rd month of pregnancy we went to cloud nine and there we consulted Dr. Sheela mam...we were actually the luckiest one that we met her and got a chance to go ahead with her treatment...we are so grateful because of the unconditional care she provided throughout my pregnancy...from the very first day of my emergency appointment she always listen to our questions and answer them with so much care, understanding and patience(Specially my Husband's Questions)... she always took time from her busy schedule to message us back if we had any kind of doubt throughout pregnancy...She Literally is a "Saviour" for us...Even after my delivery she took time to ask me about my and my baby's health..**** ** *** *******.Thankyou soo much Dr. Sheela Mam for all the support and the unconditional care you have provided us throughout the pregnancy...May GOD bless you with the best of His Blessings

I am so happy to have trusted Dr. Sheela with my Mirena removal. My Mirena insertion had been very painful and had to be done under anestesia. I feared that it was going to be a repeat of the same this time around too. But to my surprise, the procedure went off very well; with no sedatives, with the shortest time possible and completely painfree. Dr. Sheela is very friendly, approachable and understands the pulse of her patients. She is a good listener and puts one at ease with her efficient appraisal of the situation. I would highly recommend her after having experienced her healing touch myself.
We consulted Dr.Sheela R. Gajapathy,she is absolutely gem of a person.she guided us very well and supported through out our process, thankyou Dr.sheela.
